Scene:
The Tea Ceremony House
(Sukiya / 数寄屋)

Play: Gonza the Lancer (鑓の権三重帷子)

Production: July 1971

– Click image to view.



Narrators (Tayu):

Takemoto Mojitayū IX (see also Takemoto Sumitayū VII) (竹本文字大夫 (九))



Shamisen Players:

Nozawa Katsutarō II (野澤勝太郎 (二))
